Class DomainImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.DomainImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Domain

    public class DomainImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Domain, java.io.Serializable
    Implementation of Domain. Representation of the outcome space of a scenario.
    Author:
    Dmytro Tykhonov & Koen Hindriks
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
